txt.en: Authi can be found in Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should speak with Authi.
Roving Threat: Hrimdyr, the Beast King
Beasts of various origins have been causing problems for the dwarves in the Misty Mountains, including Hrimdyr, who ambushes wary explorers on the high mountain pass.
Hrimdyr can be found somewhere in The Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should defeat Hrimdyr.

'Some creatures in these mountains are quite dangerous, but none are as deadly as Hrimdyr.

'Hrimdyr may not be as strong as a giant, but it hunts from snowdrifts and in blinding snows. You never see the creature coming until it is too late!

'I could use your skills in dealing with this dangerous creature.'
'The Snow Beast is no more? Great news, my friend. This will indeed make travel through the mountains much safer. You shall be rewarded for your efforts.'
